data.name: Leading Through COVID-19: Post-Pandemic Opportunities for Manufacturing Industries
data.summary:
Immediate impacts to industrial manufacturers, workforces, and IT and technology provisioning
Diminishing supply chain capacity and the importance of collaboration across IT and supply chain
Post-COVID-19 opportunities for manufacturing industries and how IT should
data.speakers:
Frank Ridder, Managing Vice President
Marc Halpern, VP Analyst
Ron Kumar, Sr Director Analyst
